extendedInfo.description: You are having difficulty typing addresses or selecting sections of news websites? This app is for you!EasyNews US provides you a list of the most major news websites in US and supports an Android native control to select a section of website (Technology, Sports...). Reading news now is very easy on Android.Supported news sites:  * CNN news (cnn.com) * ESPN news (espn.go.com) * New York Times news (nytimes.com) * Huffington Post news (huffingtonpost.com) * CNET news (cnet.com) * FOX News (foxnews.com) * NFL news (nfl.com) * Wall Street Journal news (wsj.com) * BBC news (bbc.co.uk) * Bloomberg news (bloomberg.com) * Yahoo! News (yahoo.com) * Google News (google.com)
